resources.string:
This is it! This release of Cadpage will not process SMS or MMS dispatch alerts unless you have the Cadpage support app installed. If you need the support app and it is not currently installed, you will be prompted to install it when this upgrade is installed. For details see http://www.cadpage.org/faq/cadpage-2-0
 Updated 03/09/2019
